string-array.name: notification_channel
string-array.item: A Notification Channel for Coffee App
%s, you ordered a coffee with a cost of: %.2f\n%s

resources.string: Calculation of the amount is never been an easy task calculating commission,and savings is just a single click away from you
"Ordering ice cream has never been easier. Just enter the quantity of flavors you want, click Generate Bill, and let the deliciousness come to you!"

Welcome to a world where happiness is served in a cone! Explore our ice cream app and let your taste buds dance with joy. 
 Golcha icecream welcomes you on this application which is designed to make you comfortable in every aspects 
 {1} You can order online and can generate and save your bills for future. 
 {2} You can calculate total by setting commission of selling vendors and can generate bill too. 
 YOUR PROFILE ARE UNIQUE ALL THE HISTORY OF YOUR PROFILE WILL BE SAVE FOR FUTURE.
